price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងបានដឹកពួកអ្នកនៅលើសំពៅនៅ ពេលដែលទឹកជំនន់ឡើងហួសកំរិត។
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
